## a bit of data science

```{r}
data(package = 'palmerpenguins')
head(penguins)

penguins |> 
  count(species)
```

```{r output=FALSE}
library(tidygraph)
library(igraph)
library(ggraph)
```

```{r}

peng_island <- penguins |> 
  count(species, island) 

peng_island |> 
  graph_from_data_frame() |> 
  as_tbl_graph() |> 
  ggraph(layout = "tree")+
  geom_edge_link(aes(alpha = n))+
  geom_node_label(aes(label = name))+
  theme_void()+
  ggtitle("Islands and penguins")
```

## let's save our data

```{r}
penguins |> 
  head(20) |> 
  write_csv("penguins20.csv")
```

```{r}
penguins_20 <- read_csv("penguins20.csv")

penguins_20
```
